stimulusHtml: Scholars believe that the conical tower of Great Zimbabwe functioned symbolically by referencing the form of a

features.html: © Werner Forman Archive/The Bridgeman Art Library

choicesHtml: granary which recalled the generosity of the Shona ruler to his people
natural cave where the Shona ruler would present himself to his people
grave marker that affirmed the Shona ruler’s connection to the ancestral past of his people
watchtower which demonstrated the Shona ruler would watch over and protect his people
